function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Identification of nodes in the surroundings of amenities can lead to the propagation of contagious diseases if these nodes are in close proximity to infected individuals or high-risk areas.","Impact":"Unrestricted movement in areas with contagious diseases can lead to a higher risk of transmission and spread of the disease.","Mitigation":"Implement restrictions on movement in the identified areas or prioritize safer routes to minimize exposure to contagious diseases.","Technologies":"Geofencing, routing algorithms, and mapping software can be used to create restricted areas and calculate safe routes for movement.","People":"Individuals residing or working near the identified nodes, public health authorities, and urban planners.","Owner":"Public health authorities, local government, and technology companies."}]}
